response.original_title: The Ultimate Bass demo Disc volume 1
response.overview: Dynamic soundtracks from films, with an emphasis on the low-frequency component - for demonstrating the subwoofer. The sound is original, with the highest possible quality, including true hd, DTS MA, it is no secret that the sound in polyphonic translations and dubbing does not differ for the better in quality from the original. In scenes with explosions and other effects, translation is not required, although there are dialogues.
response.title: The Ultimate Bass demo Disc volume 1
